    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92937</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92937</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The compass and the earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Kompaß und die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La boussole et la terre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O compasso e a terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La bussola e la terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πυξίδα και η γη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El compás y la tierra</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the lines of magnetic force of the Earth that makes the north pole of a compass point north.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lines of magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south pole</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Zeilen der magnetischen 
Kraft der Masse, die den Nordpol von einer Himmelsrichtung Nord 
bildet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre les lignes de la force 
magnétique de la terre qui rend le pôle du nord d'un point de 
boussole du nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra as linhas da força 
magnética da terra que faz o pólo norte de um ponto de compasso 
norte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra le righe di forza magnetica 
della terra che rende il palo del nord di un punto di bussola del 
nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει τις γραμμές μαγνητικής 
δύναμης της γης που κάνει το βόρειο πόλο μιας πυξίδας να δείξει 
το Βορρά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra las líneas de la fuerza 
magnética de la tierra que hace el Polo Norte de una punta de compás
del norte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kompaß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeilen der magnetischen Kraft</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
